item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Notes on building an app that looks like an IKEA manual (63 points | 11 comments)
2. Ledger Implementation in PostgreSQL (32 points | 3 comments)
3. Post Apocalyptic Computing (7 points | 3 comments)
4. Avoid building a security treadmill (65 points | 22 comments)
5. GPSTracker: A self-hosted FOSS alternative to Google Maps Timeline (26 points | 6 comments)
6. Non-Obvious Haskell Idiom: Conditional For (17 points | 8 comments)
7. The next generation of Bazel builds (12 points | 8 comments)
8. RCE Vulnerabilities in k8s Ingress NGINX (9.8 CVE for ingress-nginx) (9 points | 2 comments)
9. Figma’s not a design tool — it’s a Rube Goldberg machine for avoiding code (42 points | 25 comments)
10. LLMs on a PowerPC Mac (14 points | 3 comments)
11. Triforce: a microphone array beamformer for Apple Silicon laptops (17 points | 1 comment)
12. Notes on coreutils in Rust (57 points | 70 comments)
13. Everyone quotes command line arguments the wrong way (on Windows) (12 points | 10 comments)
14. Next.js CVE-2025-29927 (2 points | no comments)
15. Exploring Ruby Ractors -- I paid for for 10 cores I'm gonna use 10 cores (18 points | 7 comments)
16. The Prospero Challenge (10 points | no comments)
17. GitButler's new patch based Code Review (Beta) (24 points | 30 comments)
18. Holograms, light-leaks and how to build CSS-only shaders (14 points | 1 comment)
19. autology: hot take on metaprogramming (5 points | 2 comments)
20. Bringing Record and Replay everywhere (16 points | 1 comment)
21. Closing the chapter on OpenH264 (1 points | no comments)
22. Nix derivations by hand (14 points | 3 comments)
23. Golang on the PlayStation 2 (20 points | 3 comments)
24. CDC attack mitigation in Plakar (1 points | no comments)
25. A Cassette Audio Control for the Web (23 points | 7 comments)
